text: David Valero Serrano (born 27 December 1988 in Baza, Granada) is a Spanish cross-country mountain biker. At the 2016 Summer Olympics, he finished 9th in the Men's cross-country event. He was on the start list for the 2018 Cross- country European Championship and he finished 3rd. ==References== Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Cross-country mountain bikers Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Granada
title: David Valero
